Hello, coders!

Welcome to SLU Computer Programming Club! This is a club where everything is about coding. We have weekly meeting on 7:00 PM Tuesday in Linex Lab (Room 121L) in Ritter Hall. During the meeting, we will blah blah blah...

News

  • we can use markdown with syntax highlighting now:

    markdown:

    *hello world!*
```c++
  int main(){
    int a=10;
    printf("hello %d!\n",a+3);
    return 0;
  }
```

    result:

    hello world!

      int main(){
    int a=10;
    printf("hello %d!\n",a+3);
    return 0;
  }

  • official website is now online.

Get Involved

We use github for most of our activities. So please sign up for an account at Github first. Then make sure that your SLU email in shown somewhere in your profile.

There are several way to get involved:

  • Apply to give a talk, See guide.
  • Use our github repos. Seeguide.
